rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
乡村医生主导的远程医疗减少了中国农村的心血管事件根据今年 ESC 2024 年大会热线会议上公布的最新研究成果，为乡村医生提供远程医疗支持可能是改善中国农村老年人获得护理服务的关键，这些老年人因房颤未经治疗可能会出现危及生命的并发症。英国伦敦（8 月 30 日至 9 月 2 日）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Village-doctor-led-telemedicine-reduces-cardioangio-events-in-rural-China.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Village-doctor-led-telemedicine-reduces-cardioangio-events-in-rural-China.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=88ff7cfc-7b44-4ba8-ae3c-3b898a533a8c Mon, 02 Sep 2024 14:18:49 -0400 Village doctor-led telemedicine reduces cardiovascular events in rural China
利用心电图和生物标志物大规模筛查房颤并不能预防老年人中风根据热线会议上提出的最新突破性研究，使用心电图和心力衰竭生物标志物进行心房颤动大规模筛查并不能预防 75-76 岁老年人在 5 年随访中的缺血性中风或全身性栓塞（血栓）今年在英国伦敦举行的 ESC 2024 年大会（8 月 30 日至 9 月 2 日）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Mass-screening-for-atrial-fibrillation-with-ECG-and-biomarker-fails-to-prevent-中风-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Mass-screening-for-atrial-fibrillation-with-ECG-and-biomarker-fails-to-prevent-中风-in-older-adults.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f9ec2206-f1bd-4c2d-8408-32bc0758f38e Mon, 02 Sep 2024 14:08:51 -0400 Mass screening for atrial fibrillation with ECG and biomarker fails to prevent stroke in older adults
事实证明，完全血运重建对于老年 STEMI 患者的头 4 年内是有效的根据今天在热线会议上发表的最新研究，在患有 ST 段抬高型心肌梗死 (STEMI) 和多支血管疾病的老年患者中，完全血运重建相对于仅罪魁祸首冠状动脉血运重建的益处在头 4 年内得到了证实。 2024 年 ESC 大会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Complete-reangioization-proves- effective-for-older-STEMI-患者-in-first-4-years.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Complete-reangioization-proves- effective-for-older-STEMI-患者-in-first-4-years.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4209639b-e270-4990-8863-ee852003a5f0 Mon, 02 Sep 2024 13:59:15 -0400 Complete revascularization proves effective for older STEMI patients in first 4 years
侵入性策略对减少老年 NSTEMI 患者的心血管死亡没有益处老年人非 ST 段抬高型心肌梗死 (NSTEMI) 后，侵入性治疗策略与单独的最佳药物治疗相比，虽然减少了非致命性心梗和随后的血运重建手术，但并没有影响心血管死亡或心梗的综合风险。今天在 2024 年 ESC 大会的热线会议上介绍了最新研究成果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Invasive-strategy-shows-no-benefit-in-cardiovian-death-reduction-for-older-NSTEMI-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Invasive-strategy-shows-no-benefit-in-cardiovian-death-reduction-for-older-NSTEMI-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=da8146c0-7c24-4457-af1f-d07c443fb797 Mon, 02 Sep 2024 13:51:22 -0400 Invasive strategy shows no benefit in cardiovascular death reduction for older NSTEMI patients
汇总分析显示，finerenone 可降低全因死亡率，但不会降低心血管死亡根据今天在 ESC 大会热线会议上发表的最新研究，对三项大型试验的汇总分析未能证明 Finerenone 可以显着降低心血管死亡风险，但观察到全因死亡率、心血管事件和肾脏结局显着降低2024 年。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Pooled-analysis-shows-finerenone-reduces-all-cause-mortality-but-not-cardioangio-death.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Pooled-analysis-shows-finerenone-reduces-all-cause-mortality-but-not-cardioangio-death.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b2b2f90c-485c-430e-8c9d-8601689734df Mon, 02 Sep 2024 13:33:35 -0400 Pooled analysis shows finerenone reduces all-cause mortality but not cardiovascular death
选择性剪接对基因表达的影响可能大于对蛋白质多样性的影响选择性剪接是一种基因过程，其中不同的基因片段被移除，剩余的片段在转录为信使 RNA (mRNA) 的过程中被连接在一起。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Alternative-splicing-may-influence-gene-express-more-than- Protein-diversity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Alternative-splicing-may-influence-gene-express-more-than- Protein-diversity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c4d7ef6f-d6f2-45f6-bd87-94c9dca89058 Mon, 02 Sep 2024 13:28:04 -0400 Alternative splicing may influence gene expression more than protein diversity
研究揭示了早发二尖瓣主动脉瓣并发症的关键遗传标记休斯敦大学健康中心的研究人员已经发现，与一种罕见的二尖瓣主动脉瓣疾病相关的基因变异会影响年轻人，并可能导致危险且可能危及生命的主动脉并发症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Study-reveals-key-genic-markers-for-early-onset-bicuspid-aortic-valve-complications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Study-reveals-key-genic-markers-for-early-onset-bicuspid-aortic-valve-complications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eb4ff91d-c18b-4597-aef1-4bbc7e6adef2 Mon, 02 Sep 2024 13:19:57 -0400 Study reveals key genetic markers for early onset bicuspid aortic valve complications
造血干细胞发育的突破为白血病和骨髓衰竭带来希望墨尔本研究人员在创造与人体极为相似的造血干细胞方面取得了世界首创。这一发现可能很快就会为患有白血病和骨髓衰竭疾病的儿童提供个性化治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Breakthrough-in-blood-stem-cell-development-offers-hope-for-leukemia-and-bone-marrow-failure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Breakthrough-in-blood-stem-cell-development-offers-hope-for-leukemia-and-bone-marrow-failure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0400e039-aa64-4607-82ba-b8c5ce13f3c4 Mon, 02 Sep 2024 13:10:02 -0400 Breakthrough in blood stem cell development offers hope for leukemia and bone marrow failure
澳大利亚青少年电子烟使用增加与高度抑郁症状有关一项针对澳大利亚高中生吸电子烟行为的研究发现，那些报告有严重抑郁症状的学生尝试电子烟的可能性是那些没有报告抑郁症状的学生的两倍多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/High-depressive-symptoms-linked-to-increased-e-香烟-use-among-Australian-teens.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/High-depressive-symptoms-linked-to-increased-e-香烟-use-among-Australian-teens.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=abe6aad4-677c-45c0-bb9e-99646bd66318 Mon, 02 Sep 2024 13:01:09 -0400 High depressive symptoms linked to increased e-cigarette use among Australian teens
研究发现广泛消融对于持续性心房颤动没有额外的好处对于持续性心房颤动 (AF) 患者，肺静脉隔离 (PVI) 消融的标准治疗与心脏其他区域更广泛的消融产生了相似的结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Study-finds-no-added-benefit-of-extective-ablation-for-persistent-atrial-fibrillation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240902/Study-finds-no-added-benefit-of-extective-ablation-for-persistent-atrial-fibrillation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7fd3ef5b-e096-407a-a0bd-860d3325435e Mon, 02 Sep 2024 12:53:30 -0400 Study finds no added benefit of extensive ablation for persistent atrial fibrillation
